1: מִזְמ֗וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <sup>623 </sup> <n>of Asaph</n> אֵ֤ל ׀ <sup>410 </sup> <n>The mighty</n> אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֡ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> יְֽהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[even] the LORD</n> דִּבֶּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>hath spoken</n> וַיִּקְרָא־ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and called</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> מִמִּזְרַח־ <sup>4217 </sup> <n>from the rising</n> שֶׁ֝֗מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>of the sun</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>to its</n> מְבֹאֽוֹ׃ <sup>3996 </sup> <n>unto the going down</n>
2: מִצִּיּ֥וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>Out of Zion</n> מִכְלַל־ <sup>4359 </sup> <n>the perfection</n> יֹ֗פִי <sup>3308 </sup> <n>of beauty</n> אֱלֹהִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> הוֹפִֽיעַ׃ <sup>3313 </sup> <n>hath shined</n>
3: יָ֤בֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>Our God</n> וְֽאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>and not</n> יֶ֫חֱרַ֥שׁ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>and shall not keep silence</n> אֵשׁ־ <sup>784 </sup> <n>a fire</n> לְפָנָ֥יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> תֹּאכֵ֑ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall devour</n> וּ֝סְבִיבָ֗יו <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> נִשְׂעֲרָ֥ה <sup>8175 </sup> <n>tempestuous</n> מְאֹֽד׃ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>him and it shall be very</n>
4: יִקְרָ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>He shall call</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>to the heavens</n> מֵעָ֑ל <sup>5920 </sup> <n>from above</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and to the earth</n> לָדִ֥ין <sup>1777 </sup> <n>that he may judge</n> עַמּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>his people</n>
5: אִסְפוּ־ <sup>622 </sup> <n>Gather</n> לִ֥י חֲסִידָ֑י <sup>2623 </sup> <n>my saints</n> כֹּרְתֵ֖י <sup>3772 </sup> <n>together unto me those that have made</n> בְרִיתִ֣י <sup>1285 </sup> <n>a covenant</n> עֲלֵי־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>with</n> זָֽבַח׃ <sup>2077 </sup> <n>with me by sacrifice</n>
6: וַיַּגִּ֣ידוּ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>shall declare</n> שָׁמַ֣יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>And the heavens</n> צִדְק֑וֹ <sup>6664 </sup> <n>his righteousness</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> אֱלֹהִ֓ים ׀ <sup>430 </sup> <n>for God</n> שֹׁפֵ֖ט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>[is] judge</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>Himself</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>himself Selah</n>
7: שִׁמְעָ֤ה <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> עַמִּ֨י ׀ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>O my people</n> וַאֲדַבֵּ֗רָה <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and I will speak</n> יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>O Israel</n> וְאָעִ֣ידָה <sup>5749 </sup> <n>and I will testify</n> בָּ֑ךְ אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>against thee I [am] God</n> אֱלֹהֶ֣יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>[even] thy God</n> אָנֹֽכִי׃ <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n>
8: לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> זְ֭בָחֶיךָ <sup>2077 </sup> <n>thee for thy sacrifices</n> אוֹכִיחֶ֑ךָ <sup>3198 </sup> <n>I will not reprove</n> וְעוֹלֹתֶ֖יךָ <sup>5930 </sup> <n>or thy burnt offerings</n> לְנֶגְדִּ֣י <sup>5048 </sup> <n>before</n> תָמִֽיד׃ <sup>8548 </sup> <n>[to have been] continually</n>
9: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> אֶקַּ֣ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>I will take</n> מִבֵּיתְךָ֣ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>out of thy house</n> פָ֑ר <sup>6499 </sup> <n>no bullock</n> מִ֝מִּכְלְאֹתֶ֗יךָ <sup>4356 </sup> <n>out of thy folds</n> עַתּוּדִֽים׃ <sup>6260 </sup> <n>[nor] he goats</n>
10: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לִ֥י כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> חַיְתוֹ־ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>For every beast</n> יָ֑עַר <sup>3293 </sup> <n>of the forest</n> בְּ֝הֵמ֗וֹת <sup>929 </sup> <n>[is] mine [and] the cattle</n> בְּהַרְרֵי־ <sup>2042 </sup> <n>hills</n> אָֽלֶף׃ <sup>505 </sup> <n>upon a thousand</n>
11: יָ֭דַעְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>I know</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> ע֣וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>all the fowls</n> הָרִ֑ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of the mountains</n> וְזִ֥יז <sup>2123 </sup> <n>and the wild beasts</n> שָׂ֝דַ֗י <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> עִמָּדִֽי׃ <sup>5978 </sup> <n>[are] mine</n>
12: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> אֶ֭רְעַב <sup>7456 </sup> <n>If I were hungry</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֹ֣מַר <sup>559 </sup> <n>I would not tell</n> לָ֑ךְ כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לִ֥י תֵ֝בֵ֗ל <sup>8398 </sup> <n>thee for the world</n> וּמְלֹאָֽהּ׃ <sup>4393 </sup> <n>[is] mine and the fulness</n>
13: הַֽ֭אוֹכַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>Will I eat</n> בְּשַׂ֣ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>the flesh</n> אַבִּירִ֑ים <sup>47 </sup> <n>of bulls</n> וְדַ֖ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>the blood</n> עַתּוּדִ֣ים <sup>6260 </sup> <n>of male</n> אֶשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>or drink</n>
14: זְבַ֣ח <sup>2076 </sup> <n>Offer</n> לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>unto God</n> תּוֹדָ֑ה <sup>8426 </sup> <n>thanksgiving</n> וְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <sup>7999 </sup> <n>and pay</n> לְעֶלְי֣וֹן <sup>5945 </sup> <n>unto the most High</n> נְדָרֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>thy vows</n>
15: וּ֭קְרָאֵנִי <sup>7121 </sup> <n>And call</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>upon me in the day</n> צָרָ֑ה <sup>6869 </sup> <n>of trouble</n> אֲ֝חַלֶּצְךָ֗ <sup>2502 </sup> <n>I will deliver</n> וּֽתְכַבְּדֵֽנִי׃ <sup>3513 </sup> <n>thee and thou shalt glorify</n>
16: וְלָ֤רָשָׁ֨ע ׀ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>But unto the wicked</n> אָ֘מַ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֱלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> לְּ֭ךָ לְסַפֵּ֣ר <sup>5608 </sup> <n>What hast thou to do to declare</n> חֻקָּ֑י <sup>2706 </sup> <n>my statutes</n> וַתִּשָּׂ֖א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>or [that] thou shouldest take</n> בְרִיתִ֣י <sup>1285 </sup> <n>my covenant</n> עֲלֵי־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> פִֽיךָ׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>according</n>
17: וְ֭אַתָּה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> שָׂנֵ֣אתָ <sup>8130 </sup> <n>Seeing thou hatest</n> מוּסָ֑ר <sup>4148 </sup> <n>instruction</n> וַתַּשְׁלֵ֖ךְ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>and castest</n> דְּבָרַ֣י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>my words</n> אַחֲרֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>310 </sup> <n>behind</n>
18: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>When</n> רָאִ֣יתָ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>When thou sawest</n> גַ֭נָּב <sup>1590 </sup> <n>a thief</n> וַתִּ֣רֶץ <sup>7521 </sup> <n>then thou consentedst</n> עִמּ֑וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> וְעִ֖ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> מְנָאֲפִ֣ים <sup>5003 </sup> <n>with adulterers</n> חֶלְקֶֽךָ׃ <sup>2506 </sup> <n>with him and hast been partaker</n>
19: פִּ֭יךָ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>thy mouth</n> שָׁלַ֣חְתָּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>Thou givest</n> בְרָעָ֑ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>to evil</n> וּ֝לְשׁוֹנְךָ֗ <sup>3956 </sup> <n>and thy tongue</n> תַּצְמִ֥יד <sup>6775 </sup> <n>frameth</n> מִרְמָֽה׃ <sup>4820 </sup> <n>deceit</n>
20: תֵּ֭שֵׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>Thou sittest</n> בְּאָחִ֣יךָ <sup>251 </sup> <n>against thy brother</n> תְדַבֵּ֑ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>[and] speakest</n> בְּבֶֽן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>son</n> אִ֝מְּךָ֗ <sup>517 </sup> <n>thine own mother's</n> תִּתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>thou</n> דֹּֽפִי׃ <sup>1848 </sup> <n>slanderest</n>
21: אֵ֤לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>These</n> עָשִׂ֨יתָ ׀ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>These [things] hast thou done</n> וְֽהֶחֱרַ֗שְׁתִּי <sup>2790 </sup> <n>and I kept silence</n> דִּמִּ֗יתָ <sup>1819 </sup> <n>thou thoughtest</n> הֱֽיוֹת־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>that I was altogether</n> אֶֽהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>was just</n> כָמ֑וֹךָ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>like</n> אוֹכִיחֲךָ֖ <sup>3198 </sup> <n>[such an one] as thyself [but] I will reprove</n> וְאֶֽעֶרְכָ֣ה <sup>6186 </sup> <n>thee and set [them] in order</n> לְעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>before thine eyes</n>
22: בִּֽינוּ־ <sup>995 </sup> <n>Now consider</n> נָ֣א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Now</n> זֹ֭את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>who</n> שֹׁכְחֵ֣י <sup>7911 </sup> <n>this ye that forget</n> אֱל֑וֹהַּ <sup>433 </sup> <n>God</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>Or</n> אֶ֝טְרֹ֗ף <sup>2963 </sup> <n>lest I tear [you] in pieces</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> מַצִּֽיל׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>and [there be] none to deliver</n>
23: זֹבֵ֥חַ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>Whoso offereth</n> תּוֹדָ֗ה <sup>8426 </sup> <n>praise</n> יְֽכַ֫בְּדָ֥נְנִי <sup>3513 </sup> <n>glorifieth</n> וְשָׂ֥ם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>me and to him that ordereth</n> דֶּ֑רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>[his] conversation</n> אַ֝רְאֶ֗נּוּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>[aright] will I shew</n> בְּיֵ֣שַׁע <sup>3468 </sup> <n>the salvation</n> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n>
